ChangeLogs.Description:
Add ability to install from GitHub URLS.
Add crude error reporting for telemetry users.
Tidy up options screen.
Fix an issue with beta client crashing the app when detected.
Attempt to fix issues with maxmizing the window going being the taskbar.

Add basic addon search for Curse and TukUi.
Add Patreon button.
Fix issue with new version check happening too fast.
Fix crash bug when a search result has no valid file.

Add support for Addon Channels (Stable/Beta/Alpha).
Improved context menu UI.
Fix bug with trying to install TukUi from Get Addons page.
Images should look much better now.
Fix various UI bugs.
Try to add beta support.

My Addon list should no longer duplicate when hitting update-all.
New scrollbar style.
When trying to guess installed addons, prefer toc metadata.
Hopefully improve install/uninstall breaking the app during certain actions.

Requires Re-Scan.
Support for different locations per WoW client.
UI updates.
Add ignore right-click option.
Add option for collapse to tray.

Add In-App updating and restart.
Add Open Sans font to be more readible?

Add TukUI addons to the 'Get Addons' tab.
Add in some window position saving on Windows.
Add per monitor DPI awareness on Windows.
Add telemetry opt-in.
Fix issue with update-all.

Requires Re-Scan
Added Right-Click Re-Install.
Added Right-Click Uninstall.
Report installed versoin, jazz up the user-agent.
Add the new Get Addons screen.

Requires Re-Scan.
Fix Curse addon filtering to not suggest 'alternate' packages.
Rename a column in the database.
Add install tracking analytics.
Add collapse to system tray.

Requires Re-Scan.
Add support for TukUI/ElvUI.

Requires Re-Scan.
Add addon name clicks to open their URL.
Jazz up the about page.

More protection against weird toc files.
Improvements to re-scan function.

Add some extra logging and error catching.
Fix some issues searching curse for addons for PTR clients.

Add Show Log Files button.
Add in recurring call to check for app updates every 10 minutes.
Better wow folder selection validation.
Add correct task bar icon.

Add version checking to alert users of a new version available.
Fix support for classic/classic ptr/retail ptr addon folders.
Attempt to add support for Retail and Classic PTR clients
Initial release!
